column2:
ggplot(forecast.dat,aes(x= IncCongressGenericAdvantage, y = IncCongressSeatPctAdvantage, label = ElectionDate)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, alpha = .3,color = '#D22B2B')+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, alpha = .3,color = '#D22B2B')+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = TRUE, alpha = .25,size = 2) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text_repel(aes(colour = factor(midterm)))+
  labs(title = "Descriptive Relationship Between House Generic Ballot Advantage and \n House Seat Advantage (1960-2020)",
        x = "Majority Party Generic Ballot Advantage (Percentage Points)",
       y = "Majoirty Party Seat Advantage (Percentage Points)",
       caption = "Generic Ballot = Final 7-day average, Midterm years in black") +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("darkgrey","black")) +
  #scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-60, 40, by = 10)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
